gltfstatic.name: glTF Static
gltfstatic.description: Load and render static glTF 3D models.

edit-image.name: Image
edit-image.desc: Click to edit the object's placeholder image.

make-original-size.name: Size
make-original-size.desc: Click to set the object to the same size as its image.

model-url.name: Model URL
model-url.desc: URL to the glTF model file (.gltf or .glb).

rotation-x.name: Rotation X
rotation-x.desc: Initial X rotation of the model in degrees.

rotation-y.name: Rotation Y
rotation-y.desc: Initial Y rotation of the model in degrees.

rotation-z.name: Rotation Z
rotation-z.desc: Initial Z rotation of the model in degrees.

scale.name: Scale
scale.desc: Uniform scale factor for the model (applied on load).

use-built-in-model.name: Use Built-in Model
use-built-in-model.desc: When enabled, uses a built-in primitive model instead of the model URL.

built-in-model-type.name: Built-in Model
built-in-model-type.desc: Select which built-in primitive to use.

is-loaded.description: True if the glTF model has finished loading.

on-loaded.description: Triggered when the glTF model finishes loading successfully.

on-load-error.description: Triggered when the glTF model fails to load.

is-using-workers.description: True if worker threads are being used for transform calculations.

is-animation-playing.description: True if an animation is currently playing.

is-animation-paused.description: True if an animation is currently paused.

has-animation.description: True if the model has an animation with the given name.

name.name: Name
name.desc: The animation name to check for.

on-animation-finished.description: Triggered when a non-looping animation finishes playing.

is-mesh-visible.description: True if the mesh with the given name is visible.

is-mesh-visible-by-index.description: True if the mesh at the given index is visible.

has-bone.description: True if a bone or node with the given name exists.

name.name: Name
name.desc: The bone/node name to check for.

is-lighting-baked.description: True if this model has baked lighting (static lighting pre-computed for performance).

load-model.description: Load a glTF model from a URL.

url.name: URL
url.desc: The URL to load the glTF model from.

set-rotation.description: Set the rotation of the model.

set-scale.description: Set uniform scale for all axes. Applied via transform matrix (GPU efficient).

set-scale-xyz.description: Set non-uniform scale per axis. Applied via transform matrix (GPU efficient).

set-worker-enabled.description: Enable or disable worker threads for transform calculations.

name.name: Name
name.desc: The name of the animation to play.

play-animation-by-index.description: Play an animation by its index (0-based).

index.name: Index
index.desc: The index of the animation to play (0-based).

stop-animation.description: Stop the current animation and keep the current pose.

set-animation-time.description: Jump to a specific time in the current animation.

time.name: Time
time.desc: The time in seconds to jump to.

set-animation-speed.description: Set the playback speed multiplier (1 = normal speed).

speed.name: Speed
speed.desc: The playback speed multiplier (e.g., 0.5 = half speed, 2 = double speed).

set-animation-loop.description: Set whether the animation should loop.

set-mesh-visible.description: Set the visibility of a mesh by name.

name.name: Name
name.desc: The mesh/node name to set visibility for.

visible.name: Visible
visible.desc: Whether the mesh should be visible.

set-mesh-visible-by-index.description: Set the visibility of a mesh by index.

visible.name: Visible
visible.desc: Whether the mesh should be visible.

set-rotation-quaternion.description: Set rotation using a quaternion from JSON string.

set-rotation-quaternion-xyzw.description: Set rotation using quaternion components (x, y, z, w).

set-animation-frame-skip.description: Set the number of frames to skip between animation updates. Higher values improve performance. Instances are automatically staggered so they update on different frames.

skip.name: Skip
skip.desc: Number of frames to skip (0 = update every frame, 1 = every 2nd frame, 2 = every 3rd frame, etc).

set-frame-skip-lighting.description: Set whether lighting is also skipped on skipped frames. When enabled (default), skipped frames render from existing GPU buffers for maximum performance.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.desc: Whether to skip lighting on skipped frames.

set-distance-lod-enabled.description: Enable or disable automatic frame skip based on distance to camera. When enabled, objects further from the camera update less frequently.

set-distance-lod-thresholds.display-text: {my} set distance LOD: full rate radius [b]{0}[/b], max skip at [b]{1}[/b], max skip [b]{2}[/b]
set-distance-lod-thresholds.description: Configure distance LOD thresholds. Objects within 'full rate radius' always update every frame. Beyond that, frame skip increases linearly until 'max skip distance'.

fullrateradius.name: Full rate radius
fullrateradius.desc: Objects within this radius always update every frame - no skipping (default 500).

maxskipdistance.name: Max skip distance
maxskipdistance.desc: Distance at which maximum frame skip is reached (default 2000). Between full rate radius and this, skip interpolates linearly.

maxskip.name: Max frame skip
maxskip.desc: Maximum frames to skip at max distance (default 5). Higher = better performance, choppier animation.

bake-lighting.description: Bake current lighting into vertex colors for improved performance. Static models will use these baked colors instead of per-frame lighting calculations.

unbake-lighting.description: Remove baked lighting and return to dynamic per-frame lighting calculations.

refresh-and-bake-lighting.description: Recalculate lighting from current light sources and bake into vertex colors.

scale-x.description: Get the current X scale factor.

scale-y.description: Get the current Y scale factor.

scale-z.description: Get the current Z scale factor.

worker-enabled.description: Returns 1 if workers are enabled, 0 otherwise.

worker-count.description: Get the number of active worker threads.

total-vertices.description: Get the total number of vertices in the model.

mesh-count.description: Get the number of meshes in the model.

mesh-names.description: Get a JSON array of all unique mesh/node names.

mesh-name-at.description: Get the mesh/node name at the given index.

rotation-quaternion.description: Get the rotation quaternion as JSON: {"x":0,"y":0,"z":0,"w":1}

animation-time.description: Get the current animation playback time in seconds.

animation-duration.description: Get the duration of the current animation in seconds.

animation-name.description: Get the name of the currently playing animation.

animation-count.description: Get the number of animations in the model.

animation-name-at.description: Get the name of the animation at the given index.

animation-speed.description: Get the current animation playback speed multiplier.

animation-progress.description: Get the animation progress as a value from 0 to 1.

animation-names.description: Get a JSON array of all animation names.

bone-x.description: Get the world X position of a bone/node.

bone-y.description: Get the world Y position of a bone/node.

bone-z.description: Get the world Z position of a bone/node.

bone-angle.description: Get the 2D angle (Z rotation) of a bone/node in degrees. Useful for aligning 2D sprites.

bone-rotation-x.description: Get the X rotation of a bone/node in degrees.

bone-rotation-y.description: Get the Y rotation of a bone/node in degrees.

bone-rotation-z.description: Get the Z rotation of a bone/node in degrees.

bone-names.description: Get a JSON array of all bone/node names.

bone-count.description: Get the number of bones/nodes in the model.

animation-frame-skip.description: Get the current animation frame skip value.

frame-skip-lighting.description: Returns 1 if lighting is skipped on skipped frames, 0 otherwise.

distance-lod-enabled.description: Returns 1 if distance-based LOD is enabled, 0 otherwise.

effective-frame-skip.description: Get the current effective frame skip value (accounting for distance LOD if enabled).

bbox-width.description: Get the world-space bounding box width (X dimension with scale applied).

bbox-height.description: Get the world-space bounding box height (Y dimension with scale applied).

bbox-depth.description: Get the world-space bounding box depth (Z dimension with scale applied).

bbox-half-width.description: Get half of the bounding box width (for physics box shapes).

bbox-half-height.description: Get half of the bounding box height (for physics box shapes).

bbox-half-depth.description: Get half of the bounding box depth (for physics box shapes).

bbox-scale.description: Get the bounding box scale factor.
